"Greetings from the new class, Etoile!": "G-, Greetings..."
"Oh, Master! I am pleased to see you well."
"You see, Stratos informed me that advertising is an effective way for new classes to grow."
"She offered her assistance, and now we are here together spreading word of Etoile."
"Say, Stratos...? Nobody will learn of us if you do not speak."
"H-Hello, <%me>..."
"H-Hey! Please don't stare at me like that... I-It's very embarrassing..."
"Th-, That's right! The reason I'm here looking like this!"
"Luco said I should dress the part if I'm going to advertise for Etoile... So I ended up in this getup."
"Everything's so frilly, and the skirt is so much poofier than I'm used to..."
"I don't feel like myself at all in these clothes. And that makes it embarrassing..."
"That's not true at all. You look quite lovely in them. Right, Master?"
"Yeah, really cute."
"I prefer your usual outfit."
"Huh?! C-, cute... You mean these clothes?!"
"Ohh... I knew it was no use! I-I'm going to go change!"
"I-I knew it! That's what I've been saying!"
"So there, Luco! I'm going to go change...!"
"Oh my... I was delighted to have us be matching. What a shame."
"...But it is no matter. In her place, I will have someone else assist me in the advertisement..."
"...Say, Master. Would you like to take part? I have many styles available!"
